entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
